title: Prime Desire , Jawatta Road
details:
“Prime Desire” is the most seamless integration between urban and tranquility known to residential development which is conveniently located in Jawatte road Colombo.
An address that will take you places with tranquil feelings surrounded by a highly historical and prestigious neighborhood.
With so much and so close to leading private and government schools, International fast food chains, Super markets, fancy coffee shops, lounges and our very own independent arcade.
Prime Desire makes you commute on your own interests
Types are as follows
3BHK, Type C with 910 square feet
3BHK, Type D With 915 Square feet
3BHK, Type B with 1086 square feet
3BHK, Type E with 1413 square feet , only 16 out of 35 units available , and its pre-Launch prices still
